. There are dozens of islands in this Gulf. Along with the islands of Coiba National Park there is also Islas Secas, Los Ladrones, Parilla, Isla Boca Brava, Isla Palenque and Montuoso. Montuoso is the farthest island from Panama in this gulf. During certain seasons, you can even spot Galapagos seals on Montuoso. The Gulf of Chiriquí also includes one of the most famous big game fishing areas, Hannibal Banks. Coiba National Park has gained World Heritage Site status.

, which is closest to the Hannibal Banks and the big game fishing areas.
